import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Input, Form, FormGroup, Label, Button, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, ModalFooter, } from "reactstrap"; const NewNoteForm = (props) => { const [modal, setModal] = useState(false); const toggle = () => setModal(!modal); const [noteType, setNoteType] = useState(""); const [noteTitle, setNoteTitle] = useState(""); const handleSubmit = () => { props.setNewNoteData(noteType, noteTitle, props.CurrentProject); console.log("I'm here") }; return (
New Note Details:
{/* Project Name {props.projectNames.map((project) => ( {project} ))} */} setNoteTitle(e.target.value)} />
); }; export default NewNoteForm;
